chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P -> {P} + {~ P}

Premises:
ChoiceFacts.constructive_definite_descr_excluded_middle : (forall A : Type, ChoiceFacts.ConstructiveDefiniteDescription_on A) -> (forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P) -> forall P : Prop, {P} + {~ P}
ChoiceFacts.fun_reification_descr_computational_excluded_middle_in_prop_context : (forall A B : Type, ChoiceFacts.FunctionalRelReification_on A B) -> (forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P) -> forall C : Prop, ((forall P : Prop, {P} + {~ P}) -> C) -> C
exclusive_dec : forall P Q : Prop, ~ (P /\ Q) -> P \/ Q -> {P} + {Q}
Bool.reflect_dec : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> {P} + {~ P}
ssrbool.decidable = fun P : Prop => {P} + {~ P} : Prop -> Set Arguments ssrbool.decidable _%type_scope
decide_right : forall (C : Prop) (decide : {C} + {~ C}), ~ C -> forall P : {C} + {~ C} -> Prop, (forall H : ~ C, P (right H)) -> P decide
decide_left : forall (C : Prop) (decide : {C} + {~ C}), C -> forall P : {C} + {~ C} -> Prop, (forall H : C, P (left H)) -> P decide
ssrbool.impliesPn : forall P Q : Prop, ssrbool.implies P Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
ssreflect.iffLRn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ P -> ~ Q
ssreflect.iffRLn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
Bool.ReflectF : forall P : Prop, ~ P -> Bool.reflect P false
List.Exists_Forall_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, P x \/ ~ P x) -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ List.Forall P l
List.Forall_Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {List.Forall P l} + {List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l}
List.neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ List.Forall P l -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
List.Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {List.Forall P l} + {~ List.Forall P l}
Decidable.decidable = fun P : Prop => P \/ ~ P : Prop -> Prop Arguments Decidable.decidable _%type_scope
List.Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {List.Exists P l} + {~ List.Exists P l}
Bool.ReflectT : forall P : Prop, P -> Bool.reflect P true
ChoiceFacts.ConstructiveDefiniteDescription_on = fun A : Type => forall P : A -> Prop, (exists ! x : A, P x) -> {x : A | P x} : Type -> Type Arguments ChoiceFacts.ConstructiveDefiniteDescription_on _%type_scope
BinNums.positive_rec : forall P : BinNums.positive -> Set, (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xI p)) -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xO p)) -> P BinNums.xH -> forall p : BinNums.positive, P p
Bool.reflect_sind : forall (P : Prop) (P0 : forall b : bool, Bool.reflect P b -> SProp), (forall p : P, P0 true (Bool.ReflectT P p)) -> (forall n : ~ P, P0 false (Bool.ReflectF P n)) -> forall (b : bool) (r : Bool.reflect P b), P0 b r
Bool.reflect_rect : forall (P : Prop) (P0 : forall b : bool, Bool.reflect P b -> Type), (forall p : P, P0 true (Bool.ReflectT P p)) -> (forall n : ~ P, P0 false (Bool.ReflectF P n)) -> forall (b : bool) (r : Bool.reflect P b), P0 b r
sumbool_sind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> SProp), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumbool_rect : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Type), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
bool_rec : forall P : bool -> Set, P true -> P false -> forall b : bool, P b
nat_rec : forall P : nat -> Set, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
String.string_rec : forall P : String.string -> Set, P String.EmptyString -> (forall (a : Ascii.ascii) (s : String.string), P s -> P (String.String a s)) -> forall s : String.string, P s
BinNums.Z_rec : forall P : BinNums.Z -> Set, P BinNums.Z0 -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, P (BinNums.Zpos p)) -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, P (BinNums.Zneg p)) -> forall z : BinNums.Z, P z

```coq
intros P H.
apply ChoiceFacts.constructive_definite_descr_excluded_middle.
auto.
Qed.
